video.title: Winx Club
video.synopsis: In this animated fantasy, a girl named Bloom befriends a band of fairies, then follows them into the secretive and dangerous "Magical Dimension."

episodes.synopsis: Bloom gets involved in a fight between a magical fairy named Stella and a gang of trolls led by Knut the Ogre.
episodes.title: An Unexpected Event

episodes.synopsis: Bloom and Stella are assigned to the same dormitory with Flora, Musa and Tecna. The five girls become best friends, and the Winx Club is formed.
episodes.title: Welcome to Magix

episodes.synopsis: Alfea hosts a welcome party for the new students with the boys from Red Fountain.
episodes.title: Alfea College for Fairies

episodes.synopsis: The aspiring fairies experience their first outdoor exercise at the Black-Mud swamp.
episodes.title: The Black-Mud Swamp

episodes.synopsis: Stella receives what she thinks is an invitation for a date from Prince Sky, but it's actually the witches up to their old tricks.
episodes.title: Date with Disaster

episodes.synopsis: The Winx sneak into eerie Cloud Tower to get the ring back, but they find the dangerous Crypt of the Magic Archive.
episodes.title: Mission at Cloud Tower

episodes.synopsis: Alfea's headmistress punishes the fairies for having visited Cloud Tower and temporarily takes away their powers.
episodes.title: Friends in Need

episodes.synopsis: The witches cause Riven to have an accident and make it look like Bloom is the culprit.
episodes.title: A Friendship Sundered

episodes.synopsis: The mysterious voice that saved Bloom at Cloud Tower continues to torment her in her dreams.
episodes.title: Betrayed!

episodes.synopsis: During Bloom's midterm exam at Alfea, Darcy sets the Simulation Chamber to the highest level of difficulty to analyze her power.
episodes.title: Bloom Tested

episodes.synopsis: For the potion exam, Flora must find a rare flower that inhabits the Black-Mud swamp.
episodes.title: The Monster and the Willow

episodes.synopsis: Instead of preparing for her midterm exams, Stella plans to compete in the Miss Magix beauty pageant.
episodes.title: Miss Magix

episodes.synopsis: Bloom returns home to Gardenia to visit her parents, showing off her newly acquired power.
episodes.title: A Great Secret Revealed

episodes.synopsis: Bloom, Tecna, Timmy and Brandon attempt to enter the Crypt of the Magic Archive to find out more about Bloom's origins.
episodes.title: Bloom's Dark Secret

episodes.synopsis: Bloom runs into Professor Wizgiz, who drops a sealed envelope containing the answers to a test.
episodes.title: Honor Above All

episodes.synopsis: The Trix want to seize the Dragon Fire and evoke a shadow monster that's able to create terrifying nightmares.
episodes.title: Cold Spell

episodes.synopsis: Bloom accidentally discovers that Brandon is not a simple squire to Prince Sky, but that he is the real prince.
episodes.title: Secrets Within Secrets

episodes.synopsis: The three witches attack Bloom again, and she loses all her powers.
episodes.title: The Font of the Dragon Fire

episodes.synopsis: With the Dragon Fire power, the three witches take possession of Cloud Tower and imprison Professor Griffin.
episodes.title: The Fall of Magix

episodes.synopsis: Bloom and the Winx to go planet Domino, hoping to recover Bloom's power.
episodes.title: Mission to Domino

episodes.synopsis: While searching for Bloom, the Winx discover the castle. Bloom learns about her past.
episodes.title: The Crown of Dreams

episodes.synopsis: The fairies from Alfea, the Specialists from Red Fountain and their teachers prepare for revenge!
episodes.title: Storming Cloud Tower

episodes.synopsis: Bloom and friends release the imprisoned "good" witches at Cloud Tower, who join forces with the fairies to fight Icy, Darcy and Stormy.
episodes.title: Power Play

episodes.synopsis: The witches destroy Alfea and are close to controlling Magix. Bloom is guided to the bottom of a lake by Daphne's voice.
episodes.title: The Witches' Siege

episodes.synopsis: The witches suffer several defeats, and everyone under their spells is released.
episodes.title: The Ultimate Challenge

episodes.synopsis: Bloom initially seems to be weaker; however, she succeeds in defeating Icy, Darcy and Stormy and imprisons them!
episodes.title: The Witches' Downfall

episodes.synopsis: Bloom and her friends celebrate the start of the second school year at the Alfea School for Fairies.
episodes.title: The Shadow Phoenix

episodes.synopsis: Bloom and the other Winx help their new friend Layla recover from her ordeal. Meanwhile, Lord Darkar decides to enlist more evil allies.
episodes.title: Up to Their Old Trix

episodes.synopsis: Layla leads Bloom and Stella back to Lord Darkar's castle. He has captured Layla's friends, the sprightly Pixies.
episodes.title: The Rescue Mission

episodes.synopsis: Stella and Brandon are separated from their friends and find themselves in the underground kingdom of Downland.
episodes.title: Princess Améntia

episodes.synopsis: Bloom and the others attack Lord Darkar's stronghold, determined to free the Pixies from prison. But their path is blocked by the Trix witches.
episodes.title: Magical Bonding

episodes.synopsis: Bloom and the others travel to Downland, where Brandon is trapped and forced to marry Princess Amentia.
episodes.title: Runaway Groom

episodes.synopsis: Bloom and Stella bring the Pixies to Alfea. They are reunited with the other Winx, but now there is a new menace.
episodes.title: The Mysterious Stone

episodes.synopsis: Sky and the Specialists invite the Fairies to a grand-opening party at the Red Fountain School. There, Flora meets the handsome poet Helia.
episodes.title: Party Crasher

episodes.synopsis: A new professor has come to school. Professor Avalon is handsome and can fly with shimmering wings.
episodes.title: Professor Avalon's Secret

episodes.synopsis: At the Red Fountain School for Specialists, Bloom and Tecna visit Sky and Timmy, just as the Trix witches attack!
episodes.title: The Crypt of the Codex

episodes.synopsis: The Pixies are playing happily when they are struck by an evil magic spell that makes them homesick for Pixie Village.
episodes.title: Race Against Time

episodes.synopsis: Musa meets a new Specialist who has a crush on her, but she still has feelings for Riven.
episodes.title: Win-x Together!

episodes.synopsis: Bloom takes the Winx back to her home on Earth. Layla and Musa go to a dance club, but they find it's a hideout for some sinister characters.
episodes.title: The Invisible Pixies

episodes.synopsis: Prince Sky returns home to the Kingdom of Eraklyon with Bloom, Flora and Brandon. The evil warlord Yoshinoya has kidnapped Sky's former fiancée.
episodes.title: Battle on Planet Eraklyon

episodes.synopsis: Musa and the other Winx are putting on a dance show at the Red Fountain tournament, but Musa's strict father doesn't approve.
episodes.title: The Show Must Go On!

episodes.synopsis: The Winx girls take a break to celebrate Halloween in Gardenia. They are invited to a party by Bloom's old enemy, Mitzi.
episodes.title: Hallowinx!

episodes.synopsis: When the Trix return to the Cloud Tower School for Witches, the Winx must enroll there to help protect it against evil.
episodes.title: Twinning with the Witches

episodes.synopsis: The Winx try to defend Cloud Tower School from the evil Trix, but they are separated.
episodes.title: In the Heart of Cloud Tower

episodes.synopsis: Professor Avalon sends Bloom on a magical journey to learn more about her powers, but she encounters a mysterious Shadow Virus.
episodes.title: The Spy in the Shadows

episodes.synopsis: The Winx, the Specialists and the Pixies travel to the Wildlands. When trouble strikes, Bloom and the others find that magic doesn't work there.
episodes.title: Pixie Village

episodes.synopsis: Lord Darkar sends the Trix into the Wildlands to capture Bloom, who is vacationing with the Fairies and the Specialists.
episodes.title: Charmix Power

episodes.synopsis: Bloom and her friends are trapped in the forest with the Trix hot on their heels. Timmy comes up with a plan to trick the Trix.
episodes.title: Danger in the Wildlands

episodes.synopsis: The Pixies have fallen ill, so Layla and Flora take them back to the Tree of Life for help.
episodes.title: The Time for Truth

episodes.synopsis: Lord Darkar succeeds in kidnapping Bloom. The Pixies, the Specialists and the remaining Fairies set out on a rescue mission.
episodes.title: Darkar's Prisoner

episodes.synopsis: In order to rescue Bloom from Lord Darkar, the Fairies, Pixies and Specialists storm his underground castle.
episodes.title: Face to Face With the Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Lord Darkar uses his evil spells to control Bloom. With her power, he can unlock the mystic Relix and rule all the Magic Dimensions.
episodes.title: The Phoenix Revealed
